title: TFLEaRN Bot
subtitle: NTUC Income Future X Hackathon 2022 - Best Business Use Case
description: Created a Telegram bot prototype with a team that helps policyholders easily manage and access their insurance via a personalised token.

title: Overcomers
subtitle: SUTD Design Odyssey
description: Created a Figma prototype with a team of an improved digital communication board for non-verbal children on the autism spectrum.

title: Bus stop redesign
subtitle: Chalmers University of Technology
description: Worked with Chalmers University students to redesign a rural bus stop to improve commuter safety, engagement and comfort.
